QuestData.Title: Staghelm's Requiem
QuestData.Description: Staghelm has given the order. All trolls on the field of battle must be exterminated. Their preposterous claims of birthing night elves must be met with force and due prejudice.$B$BSlay them and return to me with their mojo. To reiterate: I want you to steal their mojo.
QuestData.LogDescription: You have been tasked with slaying opposing troll players in Alterac Valley.$B$BKill a troll and return to Athramanis at Dun'Baldar with Darkspear Troll Mojo.
